nodes.text: The Coruscant Classic was a swoop race that was held on the world of Coruscant, capital of the Galactic Republic, at some point prior to the year 3956 BBY. The Ithorian swoop racer Yuka Rill participated in the event. In 3956 BBY, Rill spoke of his participation with the Jedi Padawan Revan in Motta the Hutt's swoop registration office on Tatooine; the Ithorian expressed his belief that he should have quit the sport after the Classic.
The Coruscant Classic swoop race was mentioned in BioWare's 2003 video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.
